frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-brightness-control-using-ddcutil
frozen.shortDescription: Brightness control for all the monitors detected by ddcutil
frozen.longDescription:
Brightness control for all the monitors detected by ddcutil
This tool uses ddcutil as backend for communication with your display.

Updated 2022-Jan-05: There are multiple ways of listing the control sliders, either in top bar or in system menu, with or without value labels.

Read setup instructions from: https://github.com/daitj/gnome-display-brightness-ddcutil/blob/master/README.md
